title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 142.14 - Quantitative scoring factors for State contracts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 142.14 - Quantitative scoring factors for State contracts

State Regulations
(a) On contracts where State agencies do not
assess diversity practices pursuant to section
142.3
of this Part, State agencies
may establish and include a quantitative factor in the scoring of bids or
proposals submitted to agencies for bidders that are certified minority-or
women-owned business enterprises. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
142.14

Added, New

York State Register, Volume XXXVI, Issue 22, effective
6/4/2014

Amended

New

York State Register December 2, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 48, eff. 12/2/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
